name: Raiden Bombers
description:
A midterm project for a Game Programing course at County College of Morris.

Raiden Bombers is based off of the original Raiden arcade game. It is a shoot-em-up style arcade game ... except you are controlling a bomber, so you have turrets to shoot in any direction. Your goal is to get to the end of the level and bomb the targets on the ground.

Note: Works with only Mouse + Keyboard or Ps4 controller (There may be bugs with other input devices)

Have fun!
